title: Problema al acceder con un certificado teniendo varios en el almacen
content:
Buenos días. A la hora de acceder con un certificado digital, si no elijo la opción de guarda el certificado, el navegador me pregunta una y otra vez que certificado quiero usar cuando navego por la pagina en cuestión. He probado con otros certificados mismo resultado. He comprobado que los certificados estuvieran en validez y todavía les quedan tiempo para su vencimiento. He borrado todos los datos de navegación, cookies etc, sin resultado alguno. El único parche que he encontrado es: - Acceder desde una ventana privada y guardar la elección del certificado. Así cuando vuelvas a abrir el navegador te vuelva a pedir el certificado. (evitando la opción de ir a ajustes/privacidad/ver certificados/decisiones de autenticación/eliminar). ¿Cual podría ser la solución?

Muchas gracias de antemano.
creator: ayoseguacia

title: Some pages not loading in 91.10.0esr
content: I use Firefox on Linux Debian 11 (Bullseye). After a recent automatic update to Firefox 91.10.0esr, some websites will not load (just sit with a blank page, showing flicking loading symbol). Examples are ocado.com and abelandcole.co.uk. I have tried all the usual things to fix, including, switching off VPN, clearing cookies and caches, running in safe mode, all with no success. Both sites run fine in Vivaldi and Brave. I have eventually got the pages to load by disabling IPv6 in Firefox. Clearly there is a problem with 91.10.0esr. I'm not sure whether the workaround of disabling IPv6 might cause other problems or weaken security or privacy?
creator: chrisorme

title: Can not login to my firefox account
content:
I know my email and password. The problem is with gmail. I have been locked out of my gmail account for months now because when I try to login I get some stupid message about how I do not have a security key assigned. I know the email and password to that account as well.

I used that gmail email which is Jeremymayo93@gmail.com to login to my other firefox account. is there any other option besides sending the verification to my email. Could you send it to my Mayo.Jeremy@live insead? I can send you all of the account info passwords my id etc, I just have no way to access the gmail account because they told me that I need to purchase a security key for like $45 and then register it to my account on a device that I am already logged in well I am not logged in anywhere so even if I got the stupid key they are talking about I have no way to register it.

Really tired of all of my accounts being held hostage.

jeremy

Any ideas?


Thanks a million!

title: Pinch to zoom in Linux(Ubuntu) platform
content:
Hello,

I use my laptop's touchpad for zooming but it acts just like Ctrl + "+" or Ctrl + "-" and changes the whole webpage. I want to zoom in smoothly so that only that part of the screen gets enlarged (like zooming an image on touchscreen). I looked on the internet and found that it can be done by turning "apz.allow_zooming" to true from about:config but it was already set to true. I use the latest Firefox version on Ubuntu 20.04 (tried 22.04 also and wayland too). Can you please help how I can enable pinch to zoom in firefox?
creator: ravijks
